# Cleaning data

```{r}
# loading and cleaning
temp = list.files(pattern="*.csv")
opiod = lapply(temp, read.csv)
names(opiod) = c("AD1", "ASD", "ASE", "ASF", "ASG", "ASI", "ASM", "ASP", "DEM", "DSM", "EOM", "FND", "INF", "LAB", "main", "MHX", "MOT", "NMS", 
                 "QLP", "QOL", "VIS")

# saving
save(opiod, file = "opiod.RData")
```

# Loading Data
```{r}
load("opiod.RData")
```
